body:
Hi

I want to write a python script that detects CPU target then will pass that onto `spack load.`

So `spack load r` would become `spack load r target=sandybridge.`

We have a heterogeneous environment so this would be helpful to add in Slurm submission scripts.

Can someone point me to the Spack functions that detect CPU architecture?
title: script that detects cpu architecture before spack load
